attributes.action: Not make covid vaccinations compulsory for NHS workers.
attributes.additional_details: Those whom cannot be vaccinated will always be at risk regardless of covid, without Nhs workers they could pick up virus from a number of different sources unless they lock themselves away for the rest of their lives. If you make it compulsory you will lose a lot of NHS staff in a already over stretched and short staffed area.
attributes.background: Not make covid vaccine compulsory to NHS staff. Do not discriminate or take away our rights to decide on what’s best for ourselves.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
